amendment.description: To require the President to develope a comprehensive strategy toward Somalia.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4526 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4526 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6382) To require the President to develope a comprehensive strategy toward Somalia.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4526 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Feingold.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4526 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
